## Classes

### chasquid

Chasquid module init class

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `chasquid` class.

##### `config`

Data type: `Hash`

chasquid configuration

Default value: {}

##### `domains`

Data type: `Array`

list of domains to create config directories for

Default value: []

##### `package_name`

Data type: `String`

name of the chasquid package

Default value: $chasquid::params::package_name

##### `package_version`

Data type: `String`

target version/state of the chasquid package resource

Default value: $chasquid::params::package_version

##### `service_name`

Data type: `String`

name of the chasquid service

Default value: $chasquid::params::service_name

##### `config_path`

Data type: `String`

path to chasquid config file

Default value: $chasquid::params::config_path

##### `config_directory`

Data type: `String`



Default value: $chasquid::params::config_directory
